General.Name: Sun Art Retail Group Limited
General.Description: Sun Art Retail Group Limited, an investment holding company, operates hypermarkets and e-commerce platforms in the People's Republic of China. It operates its hypermarkets under the RT-Mart and Auchan brand names; and e-commerce sites comprising feiniu.com, fieldschina.com, xiaohehe.org, and auchanwines.com. The company also provides consulting, investment, and financial services. As of December 31, 2016, it had a total of 446 outlets. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
